short_summary: Dell EDCM On-Site Support and Maintenance
description: This is a solicitation for the supply and delivery of Networking products as per Annex A Statement of Work, and Annex B - List of Deliverables and Prices.

Description of Requirement
-------------------------

Shared Services Canada is seeking a service provider to deliver Dell onsite support and maintenance services for the EDCM data center in Montreal. The successful bidder will be required to provide the specified hardware and services outlined in the Annex A Statement of Work and Annex B List of Deliverables and Prices.

Key Requirements
----------------

*   The service provider must have experience in delivering similar services to the federal government.
*   The service provider must have a valid security clearance to work on government contracts.
*   The service provider must demonstrate a strong understanding of the required hardware and services outlined in the Annex
